results.description: Grace Reid, who secured an Olympic place for GB by making the final, finishes eighth in the 3m springboard event as 'untouchable' Shi Tingmao retains her world title with an incredible final score of 391.

results.description: Britain's Jack Laugher says he "feels dead inside" after slipping from gold position to take bronze in the 3m springboard at the World Championships.

results.description: British diver Jack Laugher has to settle for a World Championship bronze medal in the men's 3m springboard final after a "calamitous" error on his last dive sees him lose the lead.
results.shortTitle: ‘That will haunt him forever’ - Laugher blows world gold with calamitous error
